pkgmetadata.longdescription: rcdklib - CDK libraries packaged for R // This package provides the CDK libraries for use in the R environment. Given the size of the library itself, this package is not expected to change very frequently. To make use of the CDK within R, it is suggested that you use the rcdk package. Note that it is possible to directly interact with the CDK using rJava. However rcdk exposes functionality in a more idiomatic way
